description: In a statement to NPR, Delta acknowledged the Department of Transportation’s notice and said the airline is "fully cooperating" with the investigation.
title: DOT investigating Delta delays

description: More voters are now undecided after President Biden decided not to run for reelection, according to an NPR/PBS News/Marist survey. Vice President Harris has a brief opportunity to win them over.
title: Poll: Presidential race hits a reset with Harris vs. Trump

description: In a statement to NPR, Delta acknowledged the Department of Transportation’s notice and said  the airline "fully cooperating" with the investigation.
title: Delta's flight delays and cancelations prompt Dept. of Transportation investigation

description: Researchers made volunteers do public speaking and math on the spot, then showed them a calming video. Then, using sweat samples, glass jars and food bowls, they examined the emotional impact on dogs.
title: A study finds that dogs can smell your stress — and make decisions accordingly

description: Social media is crying out with calls for Saturday Night Live veteran Maya Rudolph to bring back her Kamala Harris impression.
title: Hey SNL, we're ready for Maya's Kamala

description: Case counts are skyrocketing in countries like Brazil and Peru and the virus is popping up in new turf, from Florida to Iran. What's the cause? And what's the solution?
title: Dengue fever is — unfortunately — having a banner year. Can it be quelled?

description: NASA is facing a tight budget and wants to wrap up the Chandra X-ray Observatory, but astronomers don't want to see the 25-year-old X-ray space telescope mission go.
title: Astronomers are scrambling to save the world's most powerful X-ray space telescope

description: Sonya Massey ducked and apologized to an Illinois sheriff’s deputy seconds before he shot the Black woman three times in her home. An Illinois grand jury indicted former Sangamon County Sheriff’s Deputy Sean Grayson, 30, who is white, last week.
title: Bodycam video reveals chaotic scene of deputy fatally shooting Sonya Massey, who called 911 for help
